title: New: NIGHTLY – XO
body:
Hints of The Neighbourhood, The 1975 and Walk The Moon on this debut offering from Nashville (?) duo **NIGHTLY**.

_XO_ might play a little to the ‘fuck-boi’ image that Drake fulfils on VIEWS, and perhaps teeters a little between the line dividing sickly sweet and realistically relatable, but hey, it’s a great pop song. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
